Trade/Device Name(s): ARX Liquid Amies Collection & Transport System
Regulation Name(s): Microbiological Specimen Collection And Transport Device
Specimen Container(s): Polypropylene screw-cap vial containing Liquid Amies transport medium
Sterile peel-open pouch containing Microbrush nylon flocked swab
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Specimen collection via nylon flocked swab
Bacterial viability maintenance for aerobic, anaerobic, and fastidious bacteria
Methodologies: Bacterial recovery assessment per CLSI M40-A2
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ARX Liquid Amies Collection & Transport System for collection and transport of clinical specimens containing aerobic, anaerobic, and fastidious bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and transport of clinical specimens (nasal, lachrymal, auricular secretions; urethral, rectal, vaginal swabs; wound/abscess material) potentially containing aerobic, anaerobic, and fastidious bacteria for bacteriological examination and culture
